text: Pe'er is a given name and a surname. It may refer to: * Dana Pe'er (born 1971), biologist * Daniel Pe'er (1943–2017), Israeli television host and newsreader * Shahar Pe'er (born 1987), Israeli tennis player * Pe'er Tasi (born 1984), Israeli singer and songwriter * Pe'er Visner (born 1957), Israeli politician
title: Pe'er
